message: This cracker who was obsessed with the Arabic expresion of making religious sayings into art is ignorant and afraid... almost every statue, painting and cathedral ceiling in the world for centuries was based on interpretation of the Bible. Nobody went crazy about that.

For lying drug dealers who used two innocent children to draw in a sh## load of money to save their own a$$...not to mention the many that searched for these boys at their own expense and the many many many emotionally involved in that.. If that had been MY son, I would have been searching for him night and day...not sitting at home waiting for news AND if Donald Trump offered to send a fleet of ships to search, I would NOT have turned him down! NOR would I have been touring the Bahamas while others diligently searched for my son... Unless I knew he was there!!!!

I applaud you Aidan! Finally someone with some sense comes along and I see the light again and hope is restored that the future of America isn't a total loss!!!! I agree 100%. It baffles me completely too as to why getting people fired and getting their name and faces publicly shamed to the point of no rehire is deemed acceptable for things we used to have tiny spats about in the parking lot and got over soon later. I believe it is a power trip, the rush people get to watch someone's world crumble... When these stories air, we know who the narcissists are.
